member.name: HTTP_AUTHENTICATION_HARDENING_LEVELS.HttpAuthenticationHardeningLegacy
member.summary: Server is not hardened and operates without Channel Binding Token (CBT) support.

member.name: HTTP_AUTHENTICATION_HARDENING_LEVELS.HttpAuthenticationHardeningMedium
member.summary: Server is partially hardened. Clients that support CBT are serviced appropriately. Legacy clients are also serviced.

member.name: HTTP_AUTHENTICATION_HARDENING_LEVELS.HttpAuthenticationHardeningStrict
member.summary: Server is hardened. Only clients that supported CBT are serviced.
